acf.module_short_description: Uncover the who, what, where and why of SEO.
acf.module_long_description: Understanding the importance of SEO is key to ensuring a solid SEO strategy. In this module you will learn about the core components and ranking factors of SEO before finishing off with a look how you can take your SEO to the next level by hiring an SEO team.
acf.video_url: <iframe title="Module 4: What Is SEO? | Free Advanced SEO Textbook Online 2020 | SUSO" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/juGLaxY0uGU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
acf.content:
There are countless definitions of SEO, but simply put, Search Engine Optimisation is the practice of optimising the content on a website with the aim that it will be discovered through a search engine’s organic search results.

In this module, we’ll explore the importance of SEO, highlight the core components of SEO as well as look at some of the factors that search engines like Google are looking at when deciding what pages should rank for keywords. At the end of this module, we’ll walk you through how to choose the right SEO agency for your company.
